snippet: England and its coach, Fabio Capello, may be headed for a divorce after he went on television to criticize the decision to strip John Terry of the captain's armband.
abstract: England and its coach, Fabio Capello, may be headed for a divorce after he went on television to criticize the decision to strip John Terry of the captain's armband.

headline.main: Capello and England Tumble Toward Trouble
